title: Reign of Morgana
description:
You thought you knew the origins of Morgana? 

Think again

.
Enjoy as Merlin recounts the tale of the Wicked Queen and find out how it all turned dark in this thrilling short story. ***Reign of Morgana is a stand-alone companion tale set AFTER the Kingdom Cold Series. READING ORDER1. Kingdom Cold2. Kingdom Soul3. Kingdom Untold4. Reign of Morgana
author: Brittni Chenelle
